meanings.definition: A volcanic glass that expands when heated, used in gardening and construction.
meanings.sent1: In gardening, perlite helps improve soil drainage.
meanings.sent2: Construction workers use perlite to insulate buildings.
meanings.sent3: The gardener accidentally spilled perlite all over the flower bed, creating a fluffy mess.
meanings.sent4: The expanding perlite resembled tiny bubbles trapped in the glass.
meanings.sent5: The volcanic glass known as perlite can be a valuable addition to your gardening toolkit.

meanings.definition: To insulate or improve soil with perlite.
meanings.sent1: I will perlite the soil in the garden to help the plants grow better.
meanings.sent2: Using perlite to insulate the attic will keep the house warm in winter.
meanings.sent3: The farmer decided to perlite the field, hoping for a bumper crop.
meanings.sent4: She carefully perlited the walls with the lightweight volcanic glass.
meanings.sent5: Perlite can be a great way to enhance the soil and provide insulation for your home.
